level.text: 8712.1 The Board may grant continuing education credit for whole hours only,ith a minimum of fifty (50) minutes constituting one (1) credit hour.
8712.2 The Board may grant a maximum of five (5) hours of continuing educationredits per year to an applicant for attending in-service education programs.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11937, 11949 (December7, 2010).
